pullrequest.title: Race-free worker termination, rely on new zprocess that fixes a regression

content.raw:
Looks good. Here it is applied with a remote worker, where non-termination was previously causing trouble:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/dR5qxr/images/4179298862-remote_workers_bugfix_.gif)
‌

Here I restart the tab multiple times and the child process is terminated each time, and doesn’t hang around after killing the server.
